header.tagline: Senior Marketing Strategist – SaaS & Non-Profit Expert

summary: Over 10 years of experience as a marketing strategist specializing in lead generation and brand expansion. Proven success in increasing client conversion rates by 20% and managing marketing budgets up to $1.5M USD.

bullets.text: Developed and executed comprehensive marketing campaigns that drove audience action, generated qualified leads, and created substantial sales opportunities for the organization’s seven businesses.
Created and launched strategic marketing plans for new products and services, successfully identifying and penetrating potential markets through targeted strategies.
Managed digital properties including the websites and supervised paid advertising campaigns across Facebook, Instagram, Google, and LinkedIn, optimizing engagement and conversions.
Analyzed key website metrics such as CTR, conversion rates, and promotional effectiveness to continuously refine and optimize marketing strategies for improved outcomes.
Administered a $1.5M USD marketing and communications budget and effectively led the marketing team to achieve strategic goals.
Designed and implemented comprehensive digital and offline marketing strategies for a newly established foundation, enhancing brand awareness and engagement.
Set up and optimized Google Analytics and improved SEO performance to enhance digital reach and improve visibility.
Executed email marketing campaigns, social media paid campaigns, and innovative fundraising strategies, resulting in increased donor engagement.
Directed a cross-functional team of a content developer, web designer, and graphic designer to create cohesive and impactful marketing materials.
Established and scaled the marketing department, spearheading digital transformation initiatives that significantly enhanced online visibility and brand presence.
Implemented cutting-edge lead generation strategies that delivered over 1,000 qualified leads and successfully established and launched an E-commerce channel.
Executed SEO initiatives and led content marketing campaigns, driving traffic and engagement across digital platforms.
Directed comprehensive brand strategy and managed paid campaigns on major platforms like Facebook, Instagram, and Google.
Led marketing, communications, customer service, and advertising departments, fostering cross-departmental collaboration to achieve strategic goals.
metrics: Achieved strategic goals with a 15% increase in efficiency

bullets.text: Executed integrated online and offline marketing and communication strategies to bolster brand presence and consumer engagement.
Developed and implemented strategic marketing plans focused on increasing market share, enhancing customer engagement, and diversifying the brand's product offerings.
Established a marketing agency serving international clients, effectively developing integrated marketing and communication strategies for diverse client industries.
Led market research and digital campaign initiatives for international companies aiming to penetrate Latin American markets.
Provided strategic consulting in marketing, sales, and customer service, tailoring strategies to enhance client journeys and foster growth.
Led national marketing and sales strategies with a focus on expanding sales channels and enhancing brand positioning.
Managed a substantial $3M USD marketing budget, achieving tangible improvements in brand positioning and customer acquisition.
Directed a nationwide rebranding initiative, securing strategic sponsorship deals with major Colombian sports teams.
Developed and executed regional trade marketing strategies, ensuring cohesive and consistent corporate branding across all channels.
Directed the successful rebranding of the former brand Ola to Tigo within the region.
Managed the regional marketing budget, optimizing for ROI and achievable marketing targets.

additionalExperience: Strategic contributor and volunteer with expertise in market analysis and client engagement, enhancing organizational development through innovative marketing strategies.
